From blurHY

________________________________
发件人: libingChina <notifications@github.com>
发送时间: Thursday, September 19, 2019 10:11:51 AM
收件人: HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet <ZeroNet@noreply.github.com>
抄送: blurHY <blurhy@outlook.com>; Comment <comment@noreply.github.com>
主题: Re: [HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet] About ZeroNet's future in China (#2201)


As for the issue you're talking about, I don't really get your point. The goal of ZeroNet is to provide a way to communicate without restrictions. ZeroNet isn't a project for developers or sole techy people - it's for everybody. People come to ZeroNet because they want real free speech, and politics is one of the topics that's literally impossible to discuss on clearnet, so no wonder there's more politics here.

我建议添加严格的网站过滤审核机制,现在一打开网站,进去就好多的政治内容(大部分内容很扯淡),我可以用tor浏览器访问一些不合法的网站,获取一些限制的资源,也可以在ZeroNet进行一样的操作,但是ZeroNet上大部分是政治内容,我很反感这些,我想大多普通用户也反感这些,这个很影响用户之间的推广,劝退我们这些用户.

上面的建议有点违背了ZeroNet的初衷(自由发言),为此我想了另一条建议,
严格的网站信息分类,用户按照分类有选择接收一些需要的信息,
用户有发言的自由,同样用户应该有收听的自由,(现在提供的拉黑机制不是很适应)我不能一直打开然后拉黑,我没有这个精力去操作,我想也没有用户有这个精力,当垃圾信息过多的时候,我想大部分用户会放弃的.

我们都希望享受自由,但我们同样不希望淹没在垃圾的海洋.我们中国有句古话"国有国法，行有行规,无规矩不成方圆",我只希望ZeroNet能建立自己的规范

以上建议只是个人一点想法建议,存在很多不足,希望给你带来一些参考.

I suggest adding a strict website filtering review mechanism. Now when I open the website, I have a lot of political content (most of the content is nonsense). I can use the tor browser to access some illegal websites and get some restricted resources. The same operation is done in ZeroNet, but most of the content on ZeroNet is political content. I am very disgusted with this. I think most ordinary users also dislike these. This affects the promotion between users and dismisses us.

The above suggestions are a bit contrary to the original intention of ZeroNet (free speech), for which I thought of another suggestion.
Strict classification of website information, users have the option to receive some required information according to the classification.
The user has the freedom to speak, and the same user should have the freedom to listen. (The black-black mechanism provided is not very suitable.) I can't open it all the time and pull it black. I don't have the energy to operate. I don't think the user has this energy. When there is too much spam, I think most users will give up.

We all want to enjoy freedom, but we also don't want to be submerged in the sea of ​​rubbish. We have an old saying in China that "a country has its state laws, a family has its family rules, and a trade also needs its own rules.", I only hope that ZeroNet can establish its own norms.

The above suggestions are just a few personal suggestions, there are many shortcomings, I hope to bring you some reference.

topic.title: Atexit won't handle SIGTERM
topic.body:
Solution:

```
from signal import signal, SIGTERM

signal(SIGTERM, lambda signum, stack_frame: sys.exit(1))
```

topic.title: Fix atexit not working on SIGTERM
topic.body:
I am working on HorizonManager that manages the process of HorizonSpider and zeronet.
It would terminate zeronet by sending SIGTERM.
However, atexit won't work on SIGTERM.We have to manually call sys.exit to trigger atexit.

topic.title: Any progress on DHT ?
topic.body:
# GFW is upgraded.
Tracker exchanging doesn't work now
We need DHT

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33171396/53295940-e3a7d400-3840-11e9-8fcf-23bf0accfb16.png)


Chinese users complain about 'no tracker connected' and 'no peer found' on ZeroMe ,then they leave zeronet.

topic.title: Traffic obfuscation to bypass firewall
topic.body:
Recently, GFW started to block peers. As Chinese developers have to bypass GFW to visit some sites, so we developed various protocols to achieve it. The protocols are strong enough to cheat GFW.
So, just integrate them into zeronet.

- [ ] Shadowsocks
- [ ] ShadowsocksR
- [ ] V2ray

@shortcutme 

DHT with traffic obfuscation is the solution

topic.title: Interplanetary ZeroNet proposal
topic.body:
https://github.com/blurHY/IPZN

Related:

- https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1669

As he said, we should focus on app layer, for the DHT feature will never be done.
We should aim to make it modular and support more protocols.

The present situation is serious, ZeroNet is completely unusable in China.
- IPFS works by just adding bootstrap nodes.
- Dat seems not working.
- Tox works

We can move ZeroNet onto these networks.
